message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special price. My proposal is to offer you the product for $950000. This price not only ensures you receive a significant discount but also secures your investment in a valuable asset. I believe this is a fair deal that maximizes value for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
